TABLE.NAME: workflow
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the workflow activity module instances.

FIELD.NAME: course
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: name
FIELD.COMMENT: The name of the activity module workflow instance

FIELD.NAME: intro
FIELD.COMMENT: The description of the workflow. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: introformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The format of the description field of the workflow. This field is used by feature MOD_INTRO.

FIELD.NAME: type
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of the activity module workflow instance

FIELD.NAME: lecturer
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the lecturer this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: instructor
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the course this activity is part of.

FIELD.NAME: allowsubmissionsfromdate
FIELD.COMMENT: If set, submissions will only be accepted after this date.

FIELD.NAME: duedate
FIELD.COMMENT: The due date for the assignment. Displayed to students.

FIELD.NAME: cutoffdate
FIELD.COMMENT: The final date after which submissions will no longer be accepted for this assignment without an extensions.

FIELD.NAME: timecreated
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was added to the course.

FIELD.NAME: timemodified
FIELD.COMMENT: Timestamp of when the instance was last modified.

KEY.NAME: fk_lecturer
KEY.COMMENT: The instance of user this workflow assigned as lecturer.

KEY.NAME: fk_instructor
KEY.COMMENT: The instance of user this workflow assigned as instructor.

TABLE.NAME: workflow_request
TABLE.COMMENT: Stores the workflow activity module request object instances.

FIELD.NAME: workflow
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the workflow this request is part of.

FIELD.NAME: student
FIELD.COMMENT: ID of the student owning this request.

FIELD.NAME: reason
FIELD.COMMENT: reason for the request

FIELD.NAME: other_reason
FIELD.COMMENT: The reason if 'other' option is selected

FIELD.NAME: comments
FIELD.COMMENT: The comments students have added

FIELD.NAME: extend_date
FIELD.COMMENT: The timestamp of the date student want deadline to be extended

FIELD.NAME: request_status
FIELD.COMMENT: Status of the request

KEY.NAME: fk_workflow
KEY.COMMENT: ID of the workflow this request is part of.

KEY.NAME: fk_student
KEY.COMMENT: The instance of user owning this request
